name: emotional support pickle
notes:
this pattern is written in english using u.s. crochet terms.

skill level: easy

supplies needed:
✨yarn:
6 super bulky bernat blanket in:
•green (about 1oz)

✨hooks:
•l 8mm hook

✨tools & notions:
scissors, yarn needle, stitch markers

✨other materials:
poly-fil stuffing, 2 black 10mm safety eyes, black embroidery thread
